00007 #define PIN_(p) PIN##p

00012 #define PCIE(p) PCIE_(p)

00018 #define PORTA_PCIE PCIE3
00019 #define PORTB_PCIE PCIE0
00020 #define PORTC_PCIE PCIE1
00021 #define PORTD_PCIE PCIE2

00024 #define PORTB_PCMSK PCMSK0

00042 volatile uint8_t button_pressed;
00043 
00046 void button_init(void)
00047 {
00048     // Config the I/O pin as input
00049     DDR(BUTTON_PORT) &= ~(1<<BUTTON_BIT);
00050     // Activate pull-up resitor
00051     PORT(BUTTON_PORT) |= (1<<BUTTON_BIT);
00052 
00053     // Enable pin change interrupt for the port
00054     PCICR |= 1<<PCIE(BUTTON_PORT);
00055     // Enable pin change interrupt for the pin
00056     PCMSK(BUTTON_PORT) |= (1<<BUTTON_BIT);
00057 }
00058 
00063 ISR(PCINT_vect(BUTTON_PORT))
00064 {
00065     if (!(PIN(BUTTON_PORT) & (1<<BUTTON_BIT))) {
00066         button_pressed = 1;
00067     }
00068 }
